mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE CREATE_DATE >= IFNULL(#{headDate}, '2000-01-01') AND CREATE_DATE <= IFNULL(#{tailDate}, '9999-12-31') AND ( TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', IFNULL(#{searchWord}, ''), '%') OR CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', IFNULL(#{searchWord}, ''), '%') OR WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%', IFNULL(#{searchWord}, ''), '%') )
